verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: visited] [ARG1: his wife] [ARGM-LOC: in the hospital] [ARGM-TMP: again] [ARGM-TMP: this afternoon] [ARGM-LOC: in Bethesda , Maryland] , [ARGM-TMP: as the first lady continued to recover from a surgery to treat a benign kidney condition] .

President Trump visited his wife in the hospital again this afternoon in Bethesda , Maryland , as [ARG0: the first lady] [V: continued] [ARG1: to recover from a surgery to treat a benign kidney condition] .

President Trump visited his wife in the hospital again this afternoon in Bethesda , Maryland , as [ARG1: the first lady] continued to [V: recover] [ARG2: from a surgery to treat a benign kidney condition] .
President Trump visited his wife in the hospital again this afternoon in Bethesda , Maryland , as the first lady continued to recover from a surgery to [V: treat] [ARG2: a benign kidney condition] .
